sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { NavBar } from '../cmps/NavBar' import userImg from '../assets/img/user-img.png' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../store/actions/authActions' export const UserInfo = () => { const loggedInUser = useSelector(state => state.userModule.loggedInUser) const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const onLogout = () => { console.log('logout') dispatch(logout()) } useEffect(() => { if (!loggedInUser) navigate('/login') }, [loggedInUser, navigate]) if (!loggedInUser) return
const { firstName, lastName, bio, phone, imgUrl = userImg, email } = loggedInUser return (
Personal info
Basic info, like your name and photo
Profile
Some info may be visible to other people
Edit
PHOTO
NAME
{firstName} {lastName}
BIO
{bio}
PHONE
{phone}
EMAIL
{email}
PASSWORD
********
 ) }
